Facts about me

Hi. Below are some facts about me!

Goals: Represent USA at the International Physics Olympiad.
Sports I enjoy: Table tennis, basketball, skateboarding, snowboarding, and running.
Favourite cuisine: Mexican food.
Favourite physics theory: Quantum field theory, as it thinks of particles as manifestations of underlying fields. I find this deeply philosophical.
Favourite linux stuff; distro - Arch Linux, wm - bspwm, bar - polybar. (I will be uploading dotfiles sometime in near future)
Favourite math subject: Geomtery, as I find it highly satisfying to prove concurrency and collinearity. Things I can prove in geometry hint at the ordered structure of our seemingly trivial euclidean plane construction
